headline: Turing Up the Code
description:
Looking for atypical takes on the turing tape.

Not necessarily an esoteric programming language (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esoteric_programming_language ) on it's own,

but getting creative with turing methods to impliment an esoteric/non-esoteric programming language and/or use of turning turing tape to acheive "creative" programming.

Starter examples:

1) Excel turing machine https://www.felienne.com/archives/2974 && https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/lambda-the-ultimatae-excel-worksheet-function/

Could impliment native js under hidden excel sheets. Program runs, than beat the excel point spread!

2) https://www.media.mit.edu/projects/2d-an-exploration-of-drawing-as-programming-language-featuring-ideas-from-lambda-calculus/overview/

is an in-progress concept, that hopefully will be ported to pi-calculus. Pi-calculus would permit concurrent programming.

Result-> turing songs & turing raster video from 'interpreting' a program(s).
description_zh-Hans:
寻找非典型的图灵带。

不一定是深奥的编程语言(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esoteric_programming_language )。

但要创造性地使用图灵方法来植入一种深奥/非深奥的编程语言和/或使用转动图灵带来实现"创造性"编程。

开始的例子：

1) Excel图灵机 https://www.felienne.com/archives/2974 && https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/lambda-the-ultimatae-excel-worksheet-function/

可以在隐藏的excel表下植入本地js。 程序运行时，比起击败excel的点差！

2) https://www.media.mit.edu/projects/2d-an-exploration-of-drawing-as-programming-language-featuring-ideas-from-lambda-calculus/overview/

是一个正在进行中的概念，希望能被移植到π-微积分。 Pi-calculus将允许并发编程。

结果->图灵歌曲&图灵光栅视频从'解释'一个（些）程序。
description_zh-Hant:
尋找非典型的圖靈帶。

不一定是深奧的編程語言(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esoteric_programming_language )。

但要創造性地使用圖靈方法來植入一種深奧/非深奧的編程語言和/或使用轉動圖靈帶來實現"創造性"編程。

開始的例子：

1) Excel圖靈機 https://www.felienne.com/archives/2974 && https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/blog/lambda-the-ultimatae-excel-worksheet-function/

可以在隱藏的excel表下植入本地js。 程序運行時，比起擊敗excel的點差！

2) https://www.media.mit.edu/projects/2d-an-exploration-of-drawing-as-programming-language-featuring-ideas-from-lambda-calculus/overview/

是一個正在進行中的概念，希望能被移植到π-微積分。 Pi-calculus將允許併發編程。

結果->圖靈歌曲&圖靈光柵視頻從'解釋'一個（些）程序。
